ovePumEmi_u.Description: Integer signal to control the stage of the emission circuit pump either on or off

oveTSetCoo_activate.Description: Activation for Zone temperature setpoint for cooling

ovePumEmi_activate.Description: Activation for Integer signal to control the stage of the emission circuit pump either on or off

oveTSetHea_activate.Description: Activation for Zone temperature setpoint for heating

ovePumSou_u.Description: Integer signal to control the stage of the source circuit pump either on or off

oveHeaPumY_u.Description: Heat pump modulating signal between 0 (not working) and 1 (working at maximum capacity)

oveHeaPumY_activate.Description: Activation for Heat pump modulating signal between 0 (not working) and 1 (working at maximum capacity)

ovePumSou_activate.Description: Activation for Integer signal to control the stage of the source circuit pump either on or off

oveFan_activate.Description: Activation for Integer signal to control the stage of the fan either on or off

oveFan_u.Description: Integer signal to control the stage of the fan either on or off
